mapper.select: select m.m_no , m.m_id , m.m_name , m.m_nickname , m.m_address1 , m.m_address2 , m.m_zipcode , m.m_grade , m.m_email , m.m_phone , m.m_point ,m.m_deletedate, nvl(c.countcoupon, 0) as couponNum, nvl(w.countwish, 0) as widhNum, nvl(p.countpurchase, 0) as purNum from members m left join (select m_no, count(*) as countcoupon from ownedcoupon group by m_no) c on m.m_no = c.m_no left join (select m_no, count(*) as countwish from wishlist group by m_no) w on m.m_no = w.m_no left join (select m_no, count(*) as countpurchase from purchase group by m_no) p on m.m_no = p.m_no where m.m_no = #{username}
